2005-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 17.7°C and salinity of 34.3. Deep water measurements extend to 2000m depth.
2005-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 15.8°C and salinity of 35.0. Deep water measurements extend to 3102m depth.
